p: Other studies also concluded the presence of significant potential fungicidal effects of some plant EOs such as thyme and vervain higher than chemical preparations in postharvest treatments against M. laxa, M. fructigena, and M. fructicola on peach fruit [ 1, 2]. In the same mode, EOs of fennel ( Foeniculum sativum Mill.), marjoram, oregano, and sage exhibited a fungicidal effect against B. cinerea and P. expansum in apples [ 81].
